column1: PageTitle:"Dart Flight School 2 - Flying with Dart"
PromoDescr:"After first 'Dart Flight School' Dart platform improved greatly. New features
column4: that will help to develop great web apps!"

column1: PromoTextLong:"After fist release Dart got 1.6 version. We'll continue set of events
called 'Dart Flight School' where attendees can learn Dart
features or just share their thoughts about platform."

SpeakerVSText:"More then 10 years of software development in wide spread of platform as backend and as frontend. Started with development of low-level components (C/C++/Asm) now is is working as regional lead of Twinfield and is a big enthusiast of using mordern technologies for Web."
